content: -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **wheat** - by tin can knits ============ -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **the wheat scarf pattern is now available in the free tin can knits app ** click here to download the app or to learn more 1 only see the size instructions you need tick through the pattern and make notes support is just a tap away adjust the settings to suit you *learn to knit with alexa and emily the wheat scarf is the first project in the simple collection 2 a learn to knit series with excellent free patterns and clear tutorials from your first scarf to mittens socks and sweaters learn everything you need to know to make modern seamless knits for all of your loved ones * **want to keep up with tin can knits ** sign up for our email updates 3 and we will let you know about our new designs 4 and great in-depth tutorials 5 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- **pattern info** ============ **sizing** finished scarf measures approximately 8 wide and 60 long **yarn** 400 yards aran / worsted weight yarn * samples shown in sweet fiber cashmerino worsted 6 in spanish coin and ritual dyes elder 7 in bone * **needles** us #8 / 5 0 mm * or as required to meet gauge * **gauge** 18 sts & 22 row/ 4 in stockinette stitch **notions** stitch markers darning needle **helpful tutorials** let s knit a scarf 8 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- for all pattern abbreviations techniques and to contact us visit www tincanknits com 9 -------------------------------------------------------- -------------------------------------------------------- 1 https //tincanknits com/app 2 https //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/the-simple-collection 3 http //eepurl com/k5p8l 4 http //tincanknits com/ 5 http //tincanknits com/techniques html 6 http //www sweetfiberyarns com/yarns/the-cashmerinos/ 7 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/ritual-dyes-elder 8 http //blog tincanknits com/2013/06/14/knit-a-scarf/ 9 http //www tincanknits com
